text: Guy Teissier (born 4 April 1945) is a French politician. He is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Bouches-du-Rh√¥ne department, and is a member of the Republicans. He is also the Mayor of the Fifth Sector of Marseille. On 15 March 2020, Teissier tested positive for COVID-19. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Marseille
title: Guy Teissier
